original_title: Cost of the ‘Kevili Table’ increased since 2019
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sinhala and Tamil New Year food table cost increased by at least two fold since 2019, said PublicFinance.lk
According to the latest figures, there was a 2.4 times surge in the Kevili Table.
